endpoints.description: Retrieve the status of all monitored infrastructure components, including pipelines and power grids.
Receive detailed analysis and notifications regarding detected anomalies in the monitored data.
Update the scheduled maintenance activities for specific infrastructure elements.
Access reports containing predictions about potential failures in the infrastructure.
Submit historical performance data for infrastructure for evaluation and analysis.
Obtain an overview summary of sensor readings and performance analytics.
Remove all current alerts and notifications, resetting the system state.
Modify user-defined preferences for receiving notifications about the infrastructure.
Fetch comprehensive reports on the overall reliability and performance trends of the infrastructure.
Initiate a real-time diagnostic check for specified infrastructure components to ensure optimal operation.
